sub_title: Project Lead at ASML | Ph.D in Computational Science at UvA
summary:
Project manager & Data science leader with 8+ years of experience in performing and delivering sharp and concise solutions to wide range of problems. I hold a PhD in computational physics and currently work at Europe's biggest tech company as a project lead. My forte lies in stakeholder management, leadership, science and high throughput results.

Key achievements of my life: 
• 8+ Research articles published (as 1st author) during my PhD including Nature
• Changed education field from Geology to Physics to Data science 
• Guided 100+ students to get admission into university via training and coaching
• Led my band as a singer, preforming at various gigs in Amsterdam   
• Traveled 25+ countries on road
